messages.title: Save our local A & E!
messages.content: Following leaks of secret NHS plans threatening the closure of the Accident and Emergency units at both Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex Hospital, Jon Ball and the local Liberal Democrats have been campaigning to save our local emergency services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to the closure of Accident and Emergency units at Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex Hospital, safeguarding vital NHS services.

mentions.candidate: Jon Ball is fighting to save our local Accident and Emergency units. A vote for Jon will be a vote to safeguard our vital NHS services.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners

issues.health: Jon Ball and the local Liberal Democrats have been campaigning to save our local emergency services.

quotes.text: It is unthinkable that a borough the size of Ealing could end up with no local Accident and Emergency.
Tory Health spokesman accepted Â£21,000 donation from private health firm boss
We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now...the reality is if [the NHS] hasn't worked, it has made people iller.
quotes.source: Senior Conservative MEP Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

quotes.text: David Cameron meets NHS privatisation campaigners
Key Tory MPs backed call to dismantle NHS

images.caption: Jon Ball campaigning to save the Accident and Emergency units at Ealing Hospital and Central Middlesex Hospital.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet questions the Conservative party's stance on the NHS and criticizes them for their relationship with private health investors.
